item.description:
Back by popular demand is Wonderbox, a local band from MA that plays lots of great classic rock and some modern pop. And Rich will be joining them on harmonica for a few numbers!

To make this event a success, we need some Wedelns to bring the true spirit of the event to life!

BTW - the Big Kahuna plans to make a return!
Details:
- Bedding - bring a sleeping bag and pillow or twin sheets, blanket and pillow
- Toiletries - bring slippers for the shower and a towel, soap, shampoo , etc.
Food - Chef Sean will be preparing for $25 PP
- Saturday Breakfast (eggs, pancakes or french toast)
- Saturday Dinner
Turkey Dinner, Stuffing, Mashed Potato, Cranberry Sauce and a Vegetable
Dessert - Apple Pie
Salad - Spinach Salad
Soup â€“ Red Bean and Spicy Sausage
Sunday Breakfast (eggs, pancakes or french toast.)

Please indicate in your RSVP if you want MEALS!
- Guest fee $20 pp per night

Once you RSVP yes - we can arrange payment of meals and one night's guest fee.

Please let me know if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,
John
item.how_to_find_us: Picture me in a grass skirt and coconut bra!
item.name: Weekend at The Wedeln Ski Club
